name: Adventure to Unknown [An Isekai Story]
description:
First Episode of this e p i c series (idk if I'll ever make a second game tho) I made with RPG Maker in like a week or something lol. Some of the music is also by me.

Plot synopsis:

Truck-kun goes brrr and you ded but you not ded and then it's harem time (sheesh) depression comes later when you realize something.

Pros:

MC isn't fucking dense as a black hole

3 waifus

Bad jokes

Epic battle theme

Cons:

3 typos or smth that I'm to lazy to correct now

Weird walls

0.5 % gameplay 99.5% visual novel.

Annoying Overworld Theme

"Features":

Run on walls
